hi all 
i have one question in my REST api. the Q as detailed below:
 Post =
used to create a Job with job name some some other properties. e.g
<job>
<n=
ame>joba</name>
<content>content</content>
<job>

Get returns the job @ uri=
 /jobs/joba
<Job>
<name>joba<name>
<content>content</content>
<CreationTime=
>2011-12-2</CreationTime>
<LastModifiedTime>2011-12-2</LastModifiedTime>
<L=
astRunStatus>Success</LastRunstatus>
</Job>
in Get response, except the bas=
ic data that sent by Post, it returns other information, such as CreationTi=
me, LastModifiedTime and LastRunStatus. then the xml difference comes betwe=
en post and get. SO my question is: is it necessary for me to keep the XML =
consistence in post and action. 

Thansk 
Andy
